sections.heading: Records Services
sections.text: For more information on the records services provided by the Office of the Registrar, please select a link below. For graduation ceremony information, please visit the Commencement website . Law students should contact the Conviser Law Center Registrar's Office for services at REGQ@kentlaw.iit.edu . - Apostille Certifications - Diplomas Diploma Replacement Request Form Diploma Shipping Request Form - Diploma Replacement Request Form - Diploma Shipping Request Form - Enrollment and Degree Verifications - FERPA—Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act - Transcripts - Update Personal Information

sections.heading: Class Schedules Search
sections.text: The Class Schedules search provides the courses that are available for a selected term. This tool should be used when scheduling for next semester. The Class Schedules search can be accessed by clicking here .

sections.heading: Course Catalogs
